item.description:
Agenda

A- Books IV, V, VI
*-------- > Question/Clarifications

Q: Anything confusing? Bring it up!
*-------- > Main Themes of each book (the outline will list them)
*-------- > Purpose
Q: Why did Plato write each book, try to focus on each book separately.
Q: What were his motivations?
Q: How do you think the different books are receive (how people react to them, this is a very general question)
*-------- > Conclusion
Q: How do they relate to each other?
Q: How do you feel about them?
item.name: Book IV, V, VI of Republic
